account.title: Welcome to your owner space. Let's add your property together
account.subtitle: Let's start with your personal identity information.

connectproperty.title: Consultation
connectproperty.will-delete-property: Do you really want to delete this property?
connectproperty.will-delete-applicants: Do you really want to delete this tenant(s)?
connectproperty.share-modal-description: If you want to give access to your property to an applicant, you can copy your file link and paste it into the message you will send to them.
connectproperty.share-modal-detail: The copy button will copy this link to your clipboard
connectproperty.apply-new-account: Apply by creating a DossierFacile account.
connectproperty.apply-existing-text: DossierFacile is a government startup that allows you to create your smart rental application file and share it with landlords
connectproperty.apply-new-text-1: If you don't have an account, you can create one and come back to this page later.
connectproperty.apply-new-text-2: Our application file is easy to fill out (less than 3 minutes, we promise) and it is compliant with the law and reusable for all your other visits!
connectproperty.authorize: I accept that {0}, owner located at {1}, has access to the information in my file and that of my spouse or roommate(s) if applicable. According to GDPR, I can revoke this authorization at any time.
connectproperty.not-found: The property was not found. Please check the provided link.

title.VALIDATED: Your DossierFacile has been successfully shared
title.DECLINED: The landlord received your application, but cannot view your declined file
title.INCOMPLETE: The landlord received your application, but cannot view your incomplete file
title.TO_PROCESS: The landlord received your application, but cannot view your file at the moment

subtitle.VALIDATED: The landlord now has access to all the documents you have submitted. They will contact you if they decide to proceed with your application.
subtitle.DECLINED: Our team has reviewed your file and it has been declined. Landlords can only view fully validated files. Check our comments in your messages and correct the indicated errors.
subtitle.INCOMPLETE: Your file is currently incomplete. Landlords can only view complete and validated files by our team. Complete your file now!
subtitle.TO_PROCESS: Your file is currently being processed by our team. Landlords can only view fully validated files. You will receive an email when your file has been processed.

back-to-tenant-button-text.TO_PROCESS: Check the status of your file

propertydiagnostic.subtitle: Where to find this information?
propertydiagnostic.info-text: The final energy consumption is found on page 3 of your certificate, next to the information on primary energies.

propertydiagnostic.title-where: Where to find the EPC number?
propertydiagnostic.text-where: The number of your EPC can be found on page 1 of your certificate. It consists of 13 characters. Without this identification number, the EPC is not valid.
propertydiagnostic.no-dpe-btn: You do not have an EPC number
propertydiagnostic.no-dpe-text: If your assessor did not provide an EPC number, you are in a situation that does not comply with the legislation. In this case, you have several options to address the issue:
propertydiagnostic.no-dpe-list-1: Report the issue to the certification body of the assessor (provided in the EPC PDF).
propertydiagnostic.no-dpe-list-2: File a complaint with the DGCCRF (General Directorate for Competition Policy, Consumer Affairs, and Fraud Control).
propertydiagnostic.no-dpe-list-3: Contact the nearest ANIL or ADIL, they can inform you about the legal options available to you.
propertydiagnostic.detail-form-title: If you do not have an EPC number, please fill in the following information:
propertydiagnostic.no-dpe: My property is not subject to an EPC. Learn more.

register.title: Join DossierFacile
register.accept-cgu: By checking this box and clicking "Create my account", I expressly accept the Terms of Use of DossierFacile and understand that my personal data will be used in accordance with the Privacy Policy of DossierFacile.
register.require-accept: You must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy of DossierFacile to continue

landing.title: Are you letting a property? We'll check the rental files for you.
landing.subtitle1: Our teams check the accuracy and completeness of the rental documentation, before or after a visit.
landing.subtitle2: All you have to do is choose the right candidate.
landing.subtitle3: A free service offered by the Ministry of Housing.

first.title: Our rental applications are comprehensive
first.content: No more endless back and forth with applicants to obtain missing documents or wasted hours sorting rental applications.

second.title: Our rental applications are verified
second.content: Rental applications are verified by our team of human operators, assisted by automated checks using government databases.

third.title: You just have to choose the perfect candidate
third.content: Focus on what matters most. We simplify the rest. Just sign your lease!

citation.title: Join our community of 22,000 landlords.
citation.s1: "(...) thank you for your truly amazing website. I am delighted with your services that deserve to be known and recognized (...)"
citation.s2: DossierFacile "secures my rentals, and it's very dissuasive. I inform the applicants that their supporting documents will be verified!"
citation.s3: DossierFacile "has greatly facilitated our procedures in a safe manner."

add-property.title: Add Your Property
add-property.content: Provide the essential details of your property. You can add multiple properties.

invite-tenant.title: Invite Your Tenant Applicants
invite-tenant.content: Send a link to your property to your potential tenants so they can submit their rental applications.

manage-tenant.title: Receive and Centralize Rental Applications
manage-tenant.content: Find all your applicants in your account. Choose the ideal tenant for your rental.

result.title: The rental applications from your candidates are

404.title: Page not found
404.subtitle: Error 404
404.caption: This is not the web page you are lookingfor.

content.line1: If you typed the web address in the browser, make sure it is correct. The page may no longer be available.
content.line2: In this case, to continue your visit, you can check out our homepage.
content.line3: Otherwise, contact us so that we can redirect you to the right information.
